name: Has Title
description: Document must contain a title in the metadata or as the first heading

name: Has Author
description: Document must have an author specified in the metadata

name: Uses Heading Styles
description: Document must use proper heading styles (Heading 1, Heading 2, etc.) for document structure

name: Has Paragraphs
description: Document must contain at least one paragraph of text content

name: Proper Page Layout
description: Document must have proper page layout with standard page width and height
